-- | Checks that the <https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/ogl/trunk/doc/registry/public/specs/AMD/performance_monitor.txt GL_AMD_performance_monitor> extension is available.

gl_AMD_performance_monitor :: Bool
gl_AMD_performance_monitor = member "GL_AMD_performance_monitor" extensions
{-# NOINLINE gl_AMD_performance_monitor #-}
